name: Hunt on the Snowfield
description:
Control: 

w-up

a-left

s-down

d-right

q-turn left

e-turn right

You can  press your left mouse button on items and  monsters to collect items  and attack monsters.

You and other hunters are on the same snowfield. To win the game, you need to kill all of the them.

  On the snowfield, you leave footprints on the ground,so DO remember the following points:

     Snow can HARM you:

                 1.Enemies will trace your footprints to kill you.

         2.The coldness can kill you if you don't have enough food.

     

     Snow can Help you:

         1.You can CHEAT your enemies by trackback and pick another new road,your enemies will first follow footprints on the Left.

           Once you trackback and pick another new road,you can TRANSFER BACK to the new JUNCTION and switch your road at any time.(So we advise you to creat new transfer point in advance if there's a junction in front of you.)

         2.You can trace your enemies with their footprints and kill them.

         3.the coldness will make your enemies move more slowly.

     Fights: 

         1. Weapons:

             Number on the right lower marks the damage.

             The damage of the first enemy you attack will become the upper limit of your new weapon(number on the left top), if                

            you attack enemy whose damage higher than this, your weapon will be broken.

             Defence and damage is the same.

         2. Enemey: The number above the enemy marks their damage.

                    hurt= enemy's damage - defence
